articles.title: CBOT soybeans rise on concerns about S. American forecast
articles.description: CHICAGO, Jan 19 (Reuters) - U.S. soybean futures rose on Wednesday, snapping a streak of three straight losing sessions, due to concerns about forecasts for more hot and dry weather in key growing areas of South America during February. * Soybean fields in Argentina received some recent rain but the latest outlooks called for rising temperatures in the coming days, which could

articles.title: Lionel Messi left out of Argentina squad to build match fitness amid COVID-19 recovery
articles.description: Lionel Messi has been left off Argentina's World Cup qualifiers against Chile and Colombia to rebuild his match fitness at Paris Saint-Germain.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina ends wheat harvest at a record 21.8 mln tonnes -exchange
articles.description: By Hugh Bronstein and Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Jan 18 (Reuters) - Argentina's 2021/22 wheat season produced a record 21.8 million tonnes of the grain, blowing past the country's previous all time high harvest of 19 million tonnes in the 2018/19 crop year, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said in a report on Tuesday.The harvest, which ended this month, came in 2.8 million

articles.title: Lewandowski wins FIFA best player vote ahead of Messi, Salah
articles.description: The Bayern Munich forward on Monday overturned the result last month of the Ballon d'Or prize where he placed second behind Messi, who finally led Argentina to a senior title at the 2021 Copa América.

articles.title: U.S. CDC warns against travel to 22 destinations over COVID-19
articles.description: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) on Tuesday advised against travel to 22 nations and territories because of a rising number of COVID-19 cases, including for Israel, Australia, Egypt, Albania, Argentina and Uruguay.

articles.title: Lewandowski wins FIFA best player vote ahead of Messi, Salah
articles.description: Robert Lewandowski was voted the best mens player in the world, retaining the FIFA award he won last year despite being left off the ballot paper filed by runner-up Lionel Messi.The Bayern Munich forward on Monday overturned the result last month of the Ballon dOr prize where he placed second behind Messi, who finally led Argentina to a senior title at the 2021 Copa Amrica.

articles.title: Apple confirms Apple Pay is coming to Argentina and Peru 'soon'
articles.description: Apple has updated the Latin American Apple Pay page to include mention that both Argentina and Peru will be coming online "soon."
articles.content:
Apple has confirmed that Apple Pay is coming to both Argentina and Peru soon after updating its Latin American webpage to say so. now, the Apple Pay page includes "Próximamente en Argentina y Perú," or "Coming soon in Argentina and Peru."

articles.title: Apple teases Apple Pay coming soon to Argentina and Peru
articles.description: After a bank in Peru teased the imminent launch of Apple Pay in the country, Apple is now the one saying it will launch soon.
articles.content:
After a bank in Peru teased the imminent launch of Apple Pay in the country last week, Apple is now the one saying its own payment service will be launching soon in Argentina and Peru.
